1923 Maple Crispette Babe Ruth SGC 10 ON HOLD

1933 Goudey #2 Vance PSA 3
1933 GOudey #142 Patent Card Paul Richards PSA Auth
1933 Goudey #188 Hornsby (Raw Good)
1951 Bowman Mantle SGC 20 Gone
